channel.title: Mythos
channel.description: Website: http://www.mythos.com/ Anybody ever hear about this game? I read about it in Game Informer it looks awesome! For the people who don't know about it its like a Diablo clone. Its in public beta testing now if you wanna check it out. I can't wait for the release! Sadly it hasn't been announced yet. But it has to be close since its in beta testing.
